content:
Hotham Altwaijry

  • Position: Postdoctoral Researcher
  • Area: Information Management, Data Management, Query Processing, Entity Resolution, Data Quality, Data Cleaning
  • PhD Advisor: Prof. Sharad Mehrotra
  • Thesis Title: Analysis-Aware Approach To Entity Resolution
  • Office: DBH 2081
  • Email: haltwaij AT ics DOT uci DOT edu
  • LinkedIn: click here

Education

  • PhD. of Computer Science, University of California, Irvine, USA (2008-2015)
  • M.S. of Computer Science, University of Southern California, Los Angeles, USA (2007-2008)
  • B.S. of Computer Science, King Saud University, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia (2000-2005)

Projects

  • Sherlock - Data Cleaning and Entity Resolution Project @ UCI
  • Asterix - A Highly Scalable Parallel Platform for Semi-structured Data Management and Analysis

Publications

  • Hotham Altwaijry, Sharad Mehrotra, Dmitri V. Kalashnikov. QuERy: A Framework for Integrating Entity Resolution with Query Processing. In: PVLDB, 2015.
  • Sattam Alsubaiee, Yasser Altowim, Hotham Altwaijry, Alexander Behm, Vinayak R. Borkar, Yingyi Bu, Michael J. Carey, Inci Cetindil, Madhusudan Cheelangi, Khurram Faraaz, Eugenia Gabrielova, Raman Grover, Zachary Heilbron, Young-Seok Kim, Chen Li, Guangqiang Li, Ji Mahn Ok, Nicola Onose, Pouria Pirzadeh, Vassilis J. Tsotras, Rares Vernica, Jian Wen, Till Westmann. AsterixDB: A Scalable, Open Source BDMS. In: PVLDB, 2014.
  • Hotham Altwaijry, Dmitri V. Kalashnikov, Sharad Mehrotra. Query-Driven Approach to Entity Resolution. In: PVLDB, 2013.
  • Sattam Alsubaiee, Yasser Altowim, Hotham Altwaijry, Alexander Behm, Vinayak R. Borkar, Yingyi Bu, Michael J. Carey, Raman Grover, Zachary Heilbron, Young-Seok Kim, Chen Li, Nicola Onose, Pouria Pirzadeh, Rares Vernica, and Jian Wen. ASTERIX: An Open Source System for "Big Data" Management and Analysis. In: PVLDB, 2012.
Information System Group
Donald Bren School of Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Last modified: 16 Dec 2015
